group.title: The different kinds of Unit Tests

group.title: The Naivete of Naive Bayes
group.author: Mitesh Shah
group.excerpt: A "from scratch" implementation of Naive Bayes algorithm to find a whether a message is spam or not and a kick off to the series "Machine Learning, with the Maths"

group.title: C# Properties and their different Uses
group.author: Mitesh Shah
group.excerpt: A dive into C# Properties and various interesting patterns of using them into your code

group.title: Conditional Probability and Families
group.author: Mitesh Shah
group.excerpt: A super short introduction to Conditional Probability with a fun tricky problem involving a family and their unknown children.

group.title: Constructing a complex dictionary of base and derived class using the same code
group.author: Mitesh Shah
group.excerpt: An interesting problem I encountered while working and an equally interesting solution suggested to me. How to use the same code to create complex data structure of two different classes.
